post.title: CSGORoll x G2 - A Groundbreaking Collaboration
post.excerpt: You've read it right! CSGORoll is partnering with G2, and this is what you need to know. G2 x CSGORoll We're thrilled to announce that we've partnered with G2 - the most entertaining esports organisation in the world! ðŸŽ‰ A long time coming, we can't w
post.content_html:
You've read it right! CSGORoll is partnering with G2, and this is what you need to know.


We're thrilled to announce that we've partnered with G2 - the most entertaining esports organisation in the world! ðŸŽ‰ A long time coming, we can't wait to finally let you in on the big secret.

What Does This Partnership Mean For You?

At CSGORoll, we know that you deserve nothing less than the best. Alongside the G2 Army, we'll bring you new and exciting opportunities that you won't find anywhere else. We plan to collaborate on a series of events, starting with the BLAST.tv CS:GO Major in Paris, and provide exciting giveaways which you can enter.

With G2 by our side, we can't wait to build on our pledge to elevate your CSGORoll experience, and exceed expectations every step of the way.

What Do We Have Planned With G2?

We're gearing up to reveal the specifics, but we can let you know that in May youâ€™ll find us at the G2 Booth at the BLAST.tv CS:GO Major in Paris. At the Booth, we'll be giving away exclusive Skins and prizes via a CSGORoll-inspired Slot Machine. You'll even see our logo on the G2 Jerseys of the CS:GO team and OYA female division!

We're keeping tight lipped on the extra details for now, so stay tuned for the big reveal. ðŸ˜‰

For the full details of our exciting partnership, check out G2's announcement video and official press release . But remember, this is only the beginning!

This partnership wouldn't be possible without YOU! In the last seven years, we've grown beyond expectations.

Together, we hope to show G2 what it means to be a part of the CSGORoll community, and why this game-changing collaboration is only the beginning of an unmissable new chapter in our journey.

Want to find out more? We've got plenty of details to share in the coming months, so make sure you're following our Twitter for the latest announcements.
